co.cask.cdap.api.data.stream
Class StreamBatchReadable

java.lang.Object
  co.cask.cdap.api.data.stream.StreamBatchReadable
All Implemented Interfaces:
BatchReadable<Long,String>
public class StreamBatchReadable
extends Object
implements BatchReadable<Long,String>

This class is for using a Stream as input for a MapReduce job. An instance of this class should be set in the MapReduceContext of the beforeSubmit method to use the Stream as input. 

 class MyMapReduce implements MapReduce {
    public void beforeSubmit(MapReduceContext context) {
      context.setInput(new StreamBatchReadable("mystream"), null);
    }
 }

Constructor Detail

StreamBatchReadable

public StreamBatchReadable(URI uri)
Creates a StreamBatchReadable with the given URI. The URI should be in the form 
 stream://<stream_name>[?start=<start_time>[&end=<end_time>]]

StreamBatchReadable

public StreamBatchReadable(String streamName)
Constructs an instance with the given stream name with all time range.

Parameters:
streamName - Name of the stream.

                           long startTime,

Constructs an instance with the given properties.

Parameters:
streamName - Name of the stream.
startTime - Start timestamp in milliseconds.
endTime - End timestamp in milliseconds.
Method Detail

useStreamInput

public static void useStreamInput(MapReduceContext context,
                                  String streamName)
Specifies to use the given stream as input of a MapReduce job. Same as calling useStreamInput(context, streamName, 0L, Long.MAX_VALUE)

useStreamInput

public static void useStreamInput(MapReduceContext context,
                                  String streamName,
                                  long startTime,
                                  long endTime)
Specifies to use the given stream as input of a MapReduce job.

Parameters:
context - The context of the MapReduce job
streamName - Name of the stream
startTime - Start timestamp in milliseconds (inclusive) of stream events provided to the job
endTime - End timestamp in milliseconds (exclusive) of stream events provided to the job
